activities: Rocket Fuel delivers a leading programmatic media-buying platform at Big Data scale that harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to improve marketing ROI in digital media. Rocket Fuel does not collect personally identifiable information from users or our clients to run our online marketing campaigns. However, we do collect and store personal information about our employees for human resources purposes.
